channel.title: Few Questions PLEASE Answer
channel.description:
I got a few questions, i'm new to RSPS and i'm wondering if anyone can explain this to me.
[b]There is quests needed to be done to wield dragon scim/dds/few other weps how can i mark on all new players that spawn they finished all quests.[/b]
[b]How can i mark all new spawned players finished jad and spawn with a firecape?[/b]

item.title: Few Questions PLEASE Answer
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Good, kk right in your character file it should have something to do with jad, well once again thats in your player.java just put 1 after it

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions PLEASE Answer
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

Sweet thanks, adding it now.

Now how do i set the same thing but for jad?

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions PLEASE Answer
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

If you mean how do you make it so when the player logs in they have completed all quests then go to your player.java and search this.

public int q1

once you have found this there should be like another 11+ underneath. q1, q2, q3 etc.

and change it to this

public int q1 = 15;
public int q2 = 15;
public int q3 = 15;
public int q4 = 15;
public int q5 = 15;
public int q6 = 15;
public int q7 = 15;
public int q8 = 15;
public int q9 = 15;
public int q10 = 15;
public int q11 = 15;

This means that everybody will start witha ll quests completed.

Read full topic
